changeSet.author: sunhao
sunhao
changeSet.sql:
/* robot */ DROP TABLE IF EXISTS robot; CREATE TABLE robot ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, name varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, welcomes varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, token varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, unique_id varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, avatar_url varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, enable tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', invoke_enable tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', answer1 varchar(400) DEFAULT NULL, answer2 varchar(400) DEFAULT NULL, answer3 varchar(400) DEFAULT NULL, answer4 varchar(400) DEFAULT NULL, answer5 varchar(400) DEFAULT NULL, account_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table robot

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
/* knowledge */ DROP TABLE IF EXISTS knowledge; CREATE TABLE knowledge ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, account_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, question varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, handle_question varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, answer varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, kw1 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, kw2 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, kw3 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, kw4 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, kw5 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, scene varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, emotion int(11) DEFAULT NULL, frequency int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table knowledge

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
/* invalid_question */ DROP TABLE IF EXISTS invalid_question; CREATE TABLE invalid_question ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, uuid varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, question varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, answer varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, username varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, app_key varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, ip varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, extra1 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, extra2 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, extra3 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, extra4 varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table invalid_question

changeSet.author: sunhao
yongsheng
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wechat_account; CREATE TABLE wechat_account ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, original_id varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, refresh_token varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, user_name varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, app_id varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table wechat_account

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS customer_synonym; CREATE TABLE customer_synonym ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, word_old varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, word_new varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, account_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table customer_synonym

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS joke; CREATE TABLE joke ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, value text, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table joke

changeSet.author: shenkun
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS sta_account; CREATE TABLE sta_account ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, data_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, day_account_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, day_login_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, day_valid_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, day_invalid_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, day_question_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, day_knowledge_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table sta_account

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS base_info; CREATE TABLE base_info ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, company_name varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_url varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_address varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, bus_line varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_tel varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_business varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_wechat varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_size varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_profile varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, product_introduction varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, technology_advantage varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, industry_where varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, development_prospect varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, corporate_culture varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, work_shift varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, company_leadership varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, account_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table base_info

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS story; CREATE TABLE story ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, value text, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table story

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS message; CREATE TABLE message ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, user_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, suggestion varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, feedback varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, contactInformation varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table message

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE robot ADD COLUMN short_domain_name VARCHAR(100) NULL AFTER unique_id;
alert table robot

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS personal_application; CREATE TABLE personal_application ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, user_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, app_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table personal_application

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE invalid_question MODIFY COLUMN question VARCHAR(255) NULL;
alert table invalid_question

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS feedback_message; CREATE TABLE feedback_message ( f_id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, message_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, feedback varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, admin_name varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (f_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table feedback_message

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE knowledge ADD COLUMN action_option VARCHAR(100) NULL;
alert table knowledge

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE robot ADD COLUMN profile VARCHAR(50) NULL AFTER invoke_enable;
alert table robot

changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE sta_account ADD COLUMN day_question_answer_number int(11) DEFAULT NULL;
alert table sta_account

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN forbidden_enable tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0' AFTER last_login_time;
alert table sta_account

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS registration_user; CREATE TABLE registration_user ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, username varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, nickname varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table registration_user

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS agent; CREATE TABLE agent ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, user_name varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, password varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, mobile varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, invitation_code varchar(40) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table agent

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE knowledge ADD COLUMN synonym_question VARCHAR(255) NULL;
alert table knowledge

changeSet.author: sunhao
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN claim_enable tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1' AFTER last_login_time;
alert table sta_account

changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN angel_id varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL;
alert table account

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE sta_account ADD COLUMN day_question_answer_user_num int(11) DEFAULT NULL;
alert table sta_account

changeSet.author: sunhao
liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS chat_statistics; CREATE TABLE chat_statistics ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, time datetime DEFAULT NULL, user_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, yesterday_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, all_count int(11) DEFAULT NULL, accuracy_rate varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table chat_statistics

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE chat_statistics ADD COLUMN company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL;
alert table chat_statistics

changeSet.author: sunhao
sunhao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS vote_log; CREATE TABLE vote_log ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, vote varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, voted varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table vote_log

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_user; CREATE TABLE wb_user ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, username varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, password varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, role varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_user

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_wordbase; CREATE TABLE wb_wordbase ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, word_character int(11) DEFAULT NULL, word_level int(11) DEFAULT NULL, comment varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, updated_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, create_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, state int(11) DEFAULT NULL, username varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, scene varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_wordbase

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_thesaurus; CREATE TABLE wb_thesaurus ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, word_frequency int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_thesaurus

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_synonym; CREATE TABLE wb_synonym ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, word_old varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, word_new varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, word_old_frequency int(11) DEFAULT NULL, word_new_frequency int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_synonym

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_replace_word; CREATE TABLE wb_replace_word ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, pre_replace_word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, replace_word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, updated_time varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_replace_word

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_lianxiang_replace_word; CREATE TABLE wb_lianxiang_replace_word ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, pre_replace_word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, replace_word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, updated_time varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_lianxiang_replace_word

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_oral_treatment; CREATE TABLE wb_oral_treatment ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, word varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, word_place varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, word_size int(11) DEFAULT NULL , eliminate varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_oral_treatment

changeSet.author: shenkun
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS wb_sensitive_word; CREATE TABLE wb_sensitive_word ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, word_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
alert table wb_sensitive_word

changeSet.author: haitao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mail; CREATE TABLE mail ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, biaoti varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, zhengwen varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table mail

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS recruit; CREATE TABLE recruit ( r_id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, details varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, salary varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, skills_required varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, work_experience varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, education_requirements varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, account_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (r_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table recruit

changeSet.author: haitao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS mail_phone; CREATE TABLE mail_phone ( phone varchar(11) NOT NULL, ids varchar(11) NOT NULL, flg varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table mail_phone

changeSet.author: haitao
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS fans; CREATE TABLE fans ( own_phone varchar(88) NOT NULL, oth_phone varchar(88) NOT NULL, id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table mail_phone

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE knowledge ADD COLUMN img_url VARCHAR(255) NULL;
alert table knowledge

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS robot_val; CREATE TABLE robot_val ( r_id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, robot_value decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, company_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, robot_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, account_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (r_id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table robot_val

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE chat_statistics ADD COLUMN robot_value decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL;
alert table chat_statistics

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN source varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL;
alert table account

changeSet.author: liufei
liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE robot ADD COLUMN charge_mode VARCHAR(100) NULL ;
alert table robot

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS order_form; CREATE TABLE order_form ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, robot_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, order_number varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, return_code varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, return_msg varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, appid varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, mch_id varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, nonce_str varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, prepay_id varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, result_code varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, err_code_des varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, sign varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, amountOfMmoney decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, balance decimal(12,2) DEFAULT NULL, paymentMethod varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, time varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, status varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table order_form

changeSet.author: liufei
liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS api_personal_store; CREATE TABLE api_personal_store ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, user_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, provider_name varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, provider_en_name varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, mobile varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, email varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, server_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, server_en_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, scene varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, description varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, name varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, en_name varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, url varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, version varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, method varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, approval_enable int(11) DEFAULT NULL, enable int(11) DEFAULT NULL, keywords varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, address varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
create table api_personal_store

changeSet.author: shenkun
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS love_knowledge; CREATE TABLE love_knowledge ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, created_by varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, question varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, answer varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, image_url varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, user_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, user_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, robot_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, robot_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, unique_id varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, head_img_url varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, sex int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table love_knowledge

changeSet.author: shenkun
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS love_message_log; CREATE TABLE love_message_log ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, forword_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, forword_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, receive_id varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, receive_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, message varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, love_id int(11) DEFAULT NULL, flag int(11) DEFAULT NULL, message_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
create table love_message_log

changeSet.author: shenkun
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN sex varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL ;
alert table account

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS brush_sheet_info; CREATE TABLE brush_sheet_info ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, ip int(11) DEFAULT NULL, device_name varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, form_factory varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, is_mobile varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, brand_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, model_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, devices_os varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, devices_os_version varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, uuid varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, user_id varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
create table brush_sheet_info

changeSet.author: shenkun
changeSet.sql:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS account_log; CREATE TABLE account_log ( id int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, owner int(11) DEFAULT NULL, owner_type int(11) DEFAULT NULL, deleted tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', created_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, created_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, update_by varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime DEFAULT NULL, content varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, reason varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
create table account_log

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN recharge tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0';
alert table account

changeSet.author: liufei
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE account ADD COLUMN telephone_switch tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1';
alert table account
